nodes.text: Aris was a planet in the Albarrio system of the Albarrio sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It was a world of rainforests, and home to the monkey-like scavenger known as the Wok-Wok. It served as the sector capital of the Albarrio sector, and was a stop along the Relgim Run. It had no native intelligent life, but had been colonized.
